description: Achieving WCAG 2.1 AA compliance is a major cross-cutting effort. Treating it as a final-stage 'fix-it' task will cause massive rework and release delays.
mitigation_strategy: Integrate automated `axe-core` testing into CI from Sprint 1. Make accessibility compliance a mandatory item in the Definition of Done for all UI stories.
contingency_plan: Allocate a dedicated 'accessibility hardening' sprint before the release candidate. Engage an external accessibility consultant if major issues are found late.
monitoring_trigger: Automated accessibility violations increase over two consecutive sprints.

description: The offline data synchronization logic is inherently complex. Bugs in handling IndexedDB, conflict resolution, or edge cases could lead to permanent user data loss.
mitigation_strategy: Develop a comprehensive E2E test suite using Cypress to simulate various offline/online scenarios. Implement robust client-side logging for sync events.
contingency_plan: Provide a user-facing UI with a manual 'Retry Sync' button. Develop a support runbook for diagnosing sync issues.
monitoring_trigger: Beta testers report more than two instances of data loss after an offline session.

description: A sandbox escape vulnerability in the `isolated-vm` library could allow malicious formulas to execute arbitrary code on the server, compromising the backend.
mitigation_strategy: Run the formula execution Lambda in a dedicated, highly restrictive AWS account. Enforce short timeouts and low memory limits. Subscribe to security advisories for `isolated-vm`.
contingency_plan: Implement a feature flag 'kill switch' to immediately disable the formula execution endpoint if a vulnerability is announced.
monitoring_trigger: A new CVE is published for `isolated-vm`. Anomalous execution times or memory usage are detected in CloudWatch.
resolution_timeline: 1 week to disable, 4 weeks to patch

description: Project requires specialized skills (`isolated-vm`, service workers, Terraform, WCAG). Key person dependency on senior developers creates significant bottlenecks.
mitigation_strategy: Enforce pair programming for all work on critical, specialized components. Mandate thorough documentation for architecture and setup.
contingency_plan: Have a prioritized list of features that can be de-scoped if a resource bottleneck cannot be resolved. Allocate budget for a short-term consultant.
monitoring_trigger: A single developer is consistently the only person able to review PRs in a specific domain.
